mapper.select: SELECT date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) create_date, goods.name goods_name, t1.id activity_plan_id, t1.activity_id, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT game_user_id) FROM inno72_game_user_life t2 WHERE t1.activity_id=t2.activity_id and date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) =DATE_FORMAT(t2.login_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) user_count, (select count(*) from inno72_order t3 where t1.id=t3.inno72_activity_plan_id and date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) =DATE_FORMAT(t3.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) order_count, (select count(*) from inno72_order t4 where t1.id=t4.inno72_activity_plan_id and pay_status=1 and date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) =DATE_FORMAT(t4.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) pay_count, (select count(*) from inno72_order t5 where t1.id=t5.inno72_activity_plan_id and t5.goods_type=1 and t5.goods_status=1 and date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) =DATE_FORMAT(t5.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) goods_count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP submit_time from inno72_goods goods left join inno72_activity_plan_goods pg on goods.id=pg.goods_id left join inno72_activity_plan t1 on pg.activity_plan_id = t1.id left join inno72_activity t2 on t1.activity_id=t2.id where date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(t1.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') and t2.type=1
